Requirements You are wielding a gun in the sniper group.

Taking careful aim, you try to eliminate your mark as efficiently as possible. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} your marked target with your sniper weapon. On a successful hit, you deal double your precision damage from your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.actions.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim}, but the target no longer becomes your mark.

If you use 2 actions, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the targetâ€™s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.tWS8aMCyeGKcnFh1]{Concealed} condition. If the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, reduce the flat check from being hidden from 11 to 5.
